name: Down Perilous
description:
A short demo that tests out game mechanics. I have been working on this for years and it has gone through several rewrites. I struggle with art (and other resources) and this project is a combination of my own work and the work of others; this includes paid and free art. Full credit to everyone will be available in the future; this is just a demo.

WASD; spacebar to jump (and double jump); E to interact with objects; Right mouse button to throw bombs; left mouse to use the pickaxe.

Screen transitions are disabled; enemies aren't fully functional; I am still working on optimizations as well as new types of collision.
